title: BrightPoint Security Selected to Present at Data Breach Prevention & Response Summit
text:
Submitted by admin on 10/16/2015 @ 5:17 AM Companies mentioned in this article: BrightPoint Security 
SAN MATEO, CA -- (Marketwired) -- 10/16/15 -- BrightPoint SecurityÂ™, a leading Threat Intelligence Platform provider for automation, curation and sharing of threat intelligence to fight cyber threats, today announced it has been selected to present at the Data Breach Prevention & Response Summit, being held Oct. 21 at the Hyatt Andaz Wall Street hotel in New York City. 
Company Senior Vice President of Products Ajay Nigam will present "Threat Intelligence - What You Can Learn About Your Adversaries and What They Can Learn About You" at 10 am EDT on Oct. 21. This session will examine intelligence gathering from both sides of the DMZ. Attendees will learn how they can get to actionable threat intelligence from the wide variety of data sources available, how threat information can be shared, and how emerging threat information exchange mechanisms can help organizations. 
About Ajay Nigam Mr. Nigam is the Senior Vice President of products at BrightPoint Security. He has served in executive roles at CipherCloud, Marble Security, Symantec, and VeriSign. Mr. Nigam earned a BS Tech in Telecommunication from University of Jabalpur, and is a Fellow of Indian Institute of Telecom Engineers (FIETE) and the founding Co-Chair of O-Auth. 
About BrightPoint Security BrightPoint Security provides a Threat Intelligence Platform that automates the process of collecting, analyzing, correlating and securely sharing structured and unstructured machine-readable information on current and emerging cyber threats. The BrightPoint Sentinel Platform dramatically increases operational efficiency by reducing the time it takes enterprises to identify and remediate security threats. BrightPoint enables secure and anonymous sharing and ensures control and protection of threat data. BrightPoint reduces discovery time, remediation time, and overall risk to cyber-threats. For more information, visit www.brightpointsecurity.com .
